description.value: You can temporarily apply a spellshape feat that modifies your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-warlock.warlock-spells.Item.Nur1CbemWaor1hcv]{Eldritch Blast}'s essence (such as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-warlock.warlock-feats.Item.qIxgaIaGOWcqhoyX]{Brimstone Blast} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-warlock.warlock-feats.Item.hajsYsnHM2HcsUWh]{Repelling Blast}) to your conjured weapon. The effect lasts until the end of your turn.
